titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Digital Media Center for the Arts Symposia Material
Yale Digital Media Center for the Arts Symposia Material
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday November 9, 2018 at 08:51

did.unittitle: Yale Digital Media Center for the Arts, symposia material

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The material consists of audiotapes and a poster documenting a 1997 symposium sponsored by the Yale Digital Media Center for the Arts titled "Moving Images: University Libraries and Museums in the Digital Marketplace."

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Digital Media Center for the Arts

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 37 (YRG 37), Records of associations, institutes, centers, and organizations affiliated with Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research. Original audiovisual materials, as well as preservation and duplicating masters, may not be played. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist must pay for a use copy, which is retained by the repository. Researchers wishing to obtain an additional copy for their personal use should consult Copying Services information on the Manuscripts and Archives web site.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Digital Media Center for the Arts Symposia Material (RU 389). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by type of material.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The material consists of audiotapes and a poster documenting a 1997 symposium sponsored by the Yale Digital Media Center for the Arts titled "Moving Images: University Libraries and Museums in the Digital Marketplace."

controlaccess.subject: Academic libraries
College museums
controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. Digital Media Center for the Arts

did.unittitle: Audiotapes and poster of symposium, "Moving Images: University Libraries and Museums in the Digital Marketplace"
"Moving Images: University Libraries and Museums in the Digital Marketplace" symposium

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Original audiovisual materials, as well as preservation and duplicating masters, may not be played. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist must pay for a use copy, which is retained by the repository. Researchers wishing to obtain an additional copy of non-commercially produced items for their personal use should consult the ordering reproductions information on the Manuscripts and Archives web site.
